org.spongepowered.api.service.permission.context

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.service.permission.context.Context

  • public final class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    The context that a permission check occurs in. Instances of a context are designed to function as cache keys, meaning they should be fairly lightweight and not hold references to large objects

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Get the type.
        Returns:
        the type of item this context represents, for example for a world this would be world

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name.
        Returns:
        the specific name of the item involved in this context, for example if the type were world this would be the name of the world.
